org.castor.spring.orm

Class CastorAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.castor.spring.orm.CastorAccessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CastorInterceptor, CastorTemplate

    public abstract class CastorAccessor
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Base class for CastorTemplate and CastorInterceptor, defining common properties like JDOManager and flushing behavior.

    Note: With Castor JDO, modifications to persistent objects are just possible within a transaction.

    Not intended to be used directly. See CastorTemplate and CastorInterceptor.

    Since:
    20.05.2005
    Author:
    Werner Guttmann
    See Also:
    CastorTemplate, CastorInterceptor

      • setCastorDialect

        public void setCastorDialect(CastorDialect castorDialect)
        Set the JDO dialect to use for this accessor.

        The dialect object can be used to retrieve the underlying JDBC connection.

        Parameters:
        castorDialect - Castor JDO dialect to use for this accessor

      • getJdoDialect

        public CastorDialect getJdoDialect()
        Return the Castor JDO dialect to use for this accessor.

        Creates a default one for the specified JDOManager none set.

        Returns:
        Castor JDO dialect to be used.

      • afterPropertiesSet

        public void afterPropertiesSet()
        Eagerly initialize the JDO dialect, creating a default one for the specified JDOManagerif none set.
        Specified by:

      • convertJdoAccessException

        public org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException convertJdoAccessException(org.exolab.castor.jdo.PersistenceException ex)
        Convert the given PeristenceException to an appropriate exception from the org.springframework.dao hierarchy. Delegates to the CastorDialect if set, falls back to JDOManagerUtils' standard exception translation else.

        May be overridden in subclasses.

        Parameters:
        ex - PeristenceException that occured
        Returns:
        the corresponding DataAccessException instance
        See Also:
        CastorDialect.translateException(org.exolab.castor.jdo.PersistenceException), JDOManagerUtils.convertJdoAccessException(org.exolab.castor.jdo.PersistenceException)
